articles.description: Today, Microsoft released the May Xbox One update that brings a lot of bug fixes. However, there are a few noteworthy improvements. Why there are some changes to the Community and Mixer options on the console, the highlight has to be the fact that you can now…
articles.content:
Stayin' alive
Our top 10 picks for survival games on Xbox One
There are a wealth of survival games on Xbox One, with gameplay that revolves around hunger, thirst, and oftentimes, finding shelter (or even building your own). These uniquely challenging games … [+49 chars]

articles.author: Gary Jones
articles.title: Apex Legends patch notes for Season 5 reveal new reconnect feature - Express
articles.description: APEX Legends Season 5 patch notes are out and confirm that the new reconnect feature for the game is going live today on PS4, Xbox One and PC.

articles.content:
A supposed scam store specializing in offering difficult-to-find tech items at heavily-discounted prices recently managed to top Google Search results for a variety of in-demand products – and even had an official “By Google” tag.

articles.author: Matthew Hughes
articles.title: Press F2 to pay respects. New Xiaomi Poco Pro has 5G, top-drawer Snapdragon chippery, 64MP camera - The Register
articles.description: Flagship killer at a lower cost, though €500+ isn't exactly budget
articles.content:
Xiaomi has lifted the lid on the much-anticipated successor to 2018's Pocophone F1 flagship killer: the Poco F2 Pro. The handset, which starts at 500, packs Qualcomm's top-tier Snapdragon 865 platform and a 64MP quad-camera setup.
For the most part, the Poco… [+2009 chars]
